post:
Hi Everyone, 
After a bit of an upgrade I've got some hardware to sell. 

<pre>
Chassis: 512L-200B (<a href="http://www.supermicro.com/products/chassis/1u/512/sc512l-200.cfm">Link</a>)

CPU: Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E3-1240 @ 3.30GHz

MOBO: X9SCL-F (<a href="http://www.supermicro.com/products/motherboard/xeon/c202_c204/x9scl-f.cfm">Link</a>)

RAM: 4x 4GB DDR3 ECC

HDD: 2x 2TB Hitatchi Ultrastar 7K3000 - Purchased ~4 months ago

IPMI: Yes!

</pre>

<img src="http://i.evoburst.com/flpr429151604kw472.png" />
<img src="http://i.evoburst.com/1rpom281144313v4kq.png" />

Currently Colocated at Quadranet Los Angeles.

<pre>
Colocation Plan - 

Single Server Colo: 1U
Power Allocation: 1A 120v

10TB Monthly Public Transfer
1000 Mbps Public Network Uplinks
/26 IPv4 Allocation - 61 Usable IPs
Private VLAN
Remote Reboot
$79 MRC, $0 NRC

Paid until: 10th June 2015
</pre>


So, lets do this....

<pre>
Start: $7

BIN: $450

Minimum Increments: $7

Payment VIA PayPal. Buyer to arrange postage, Quadranet charges a standard $25 flat fee for unrack + package. Or can transfer, or arrange pickup etc..

End Time: 2nd June 2015 - 9AM (09:00) NYC Time (UTC-05:00)
</pre>


http://www.webcountdown.net/?a=svSs7Kr&k=ragz
